## ContextMenu.show() function

Construct the menu based on the list of options and show the menu.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function show(e: Event, options: (ContextMenuOption | LegacyContextMenuOption)[], rtl: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  e | Event | Mouse event. |
|  options | (ContextMenuOption \| LegacyContextMenuOption)\[\] | Array of menu options. |
|  rtl | boolean | True if RTL, false if LTR. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
